name: EIT Accordion
author: Md. Azizur Rahman

sections.description:
EIT Accordion by http://exclusiveitech.com

This plugin will add an expand collapse accordion feature inside a post or page.

Plugin Features

  • Shortcode System
  • TinyMCE Button added for generating Shortcode.
  • Easy documentation& many More.
  • Very Lightweight. Only 12KB.

Live Preview:http://exclusiveitech.com/exclusiveitech/eit-accordion
sections.installation:
1. Install as a regular WordPress plugin

  2. You have to use shortcode for generate accordion in post or page. Example shortcode is given below. [eitaccordion][eittoggle title=”Title”]…[/eittoggle] [eittoggle title=”Title”]…[/eittoggle] [eittoggle

    title=”Title”]…[/eittoggle][/eitaccordion]

short_description: This plugin will add an expand collapse accordion feature inside a post or page.
